statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambdaLayer)<-[LAMBDA_LAYER_VERSION_OF]-(n:AWSLambdaLayerVersion) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambdaLayer)<-[r:LAMBDA_LAYER_VERSION_OF]-(:AWSLambdaLayerVersion) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSLambdaLayer) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:AWSLambdaLayer) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
